GitPatchStatisticsDialog.getData

getData()

Public method to get the data used to generate the statistics.

Return:
tuple of list of patch files, strip count, flag indicating that the patch has inaccurate end-of-file marker and a flag indicating to not trust the line count information (list of string, integer, boolean, boolean)
